column4: hello, question: what do I type in command line to update my system?
thank you but that doesnt seem to install anything
always install nvidia drivers from synaptic
i tried and it didnt go for some odd reason, just sat there, a manual download from nvidia website
that manual thing is difficultto do
i can go back into x but it doesnt move, the bar just sits there, I ahve internet conneciton and all is well
when you activate the proprietary drivers it goes to the internet to download them
mine just sits there at 0% yet i have full internet
ya dont install from that window
